location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Governmentat Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Governmentat Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting copy of the instructions issued to Captain Eatwell of the Honorable Company Cruizer Benaresby Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, on 27 February 1814, containing the policy intended to be pursued towards the Joasimese [Qasimi] pirates, until the receipt of further orders from the Government.
